text.content: Pound veal cutlets between parchment paper. Lightly flour them, removing excess.
Melt 40 g butter in a large pan over low heat. Add cutlets, increase heat slightly, and brown for a couple of minutes on each side. Season with fine salt and black pepper.
Lower heat, add 50 ml lemon juice. Cook gently for a couple of minutes until the sauce thickens. Turn off heat and serve immediately.
